A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not the old Star Wars Trilogy\, this will not be the old Star Wars Trilogy.. this trilogy will not follow the same plot line strategy of the old Star Wars Trilogy.. so I don't understand why you people are \"disappointed\" in the fact that this trilogy's plot line is \"not like the old one\" <-- that's basically the gist I get from reading these audience reviews.... This new Star Wars Trilogy is following a different direction from the old one and I need y'all to stop giving bad reviews because these films don't follow the Star Wars trend you fell in love with 10yrs ago.
